text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS https://t.co/XcybDuzLqf This is sobering news. We might need to remain in some form of social isolation for years. Could you please make sure that the federal government develops a free testing program in every town &city? @SpeakerPelosi @JoeBiden @BillGates @VP @POTUS @Acosta
